column1: #Text=" Merchant woman says : " Swishing means it 's ripe !
#Text=It 's the ripe juices swishing around , eh ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I think it 's true , Katara .
#Text=" Katara says : " I just realized we 're out of money anyway .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Out of food and out of money .
#Text=Now what are we supposed to do ?
#Text=" Katara says : " You could get a job , smart guy .
#Text=" Fisherman 's wife says : " We should n't go out there !
#Text=There 's going to be a terrible storm .
#Text=It 's a nice day : No clouds , no winds , no nothing .
#Text=" Aang says : " Maybe we should find some shelter ?
#Text=" Fisherman 's wife says : " My joints say there 's going to be a storm !
#Text=" Fisherman says : " Well , it 's your joints against my brain .
#Text=" Fisherman 's wife says : " Then I hope your brain can find someone else to haul that fish , 'cause I ai n't comin ' .
#Text=" Fisherman says : " Then I 'll find a new fish hauler and pay him double what you get !
#Text=You said get a job ... and he 's paying double .
